WHAT'S NEW
We’ve got you covered Boosties! Give yourself a peace of mind and get insured for 90 days with our Personal Accident Insurance.
When life starts raining on you, we’ll hold the umberella
*This insurance is underwritten by Lonpac Insurance Bhd.
Other features include:
•Food Delivery powered by DeliverEAT.
•Online Shopping powered by 11street.
•Transportation powered by Catch That Bus.

WHAT'S NEW
Hey Boosties!
Your KLIA Ekspres rides just got boosted!
It’s time to:
- Skip the long queues
- Buy tickets on-the-go.
- Get trip reminders.
- Bypass physical tickets
…And you can also purchase for your friends & family!
Update now to #DoMoreWithBoost today.

What's New:
Happy New Year Boost users! Have you seen our new icon? We’ve given our app a little #BoostiesFaCai shake-up. #DoTheBoost & Check it out!

New features & improvements include:

Ang Pow Shakes Tracker
This CNY, Win Ang Pow Shakes of up to RM8,888 weekly. The more you do, the more entries you get and the more chances you have to get a slice of that RM1,888,888 pie.

Best Deals Ever
Get on the voucher section of the Do More tab to get yourself some jolly discounted digital vouchers ranging from F&B, Online Shopping and other digital services!

If you’ve enjoyed Boost, please leave us a review. Thanks.
Minor bug fixes

Hey Boosties!

Want to get more out of your daily Boosting? Introducing our latest feature, Boost Missions.

Earn awesome rewards when you complete a task within the allocated time frame. The more missions you take on, the more rewards you earn.

That’s not all, your security will always be our top priority. You can now ensure better security when making payments via Boost with our new payment gateway.

Ready to begin your mission Boosties? Update your App now to enjoy a more secure & rewarding experience.

If you’d like our help with any issues, please email support@myboost.com.my

Spread the Chinese New Year joy by joining the Lucky Lion Match with your friends & family. Join Team Prosperity or Team Fortune and test your accuracy, feed the lion and collect points to spur your team to victory!

And in this release, you can now send Ang Pows to all your loved ones with Boost.

Update your App & Enjoy a Boost of prosperity this CNY. Happy #BoostiesFaCai to all!

WHAT'S NEW:

We’ve added an additional security option for you! If your phone supports fingerprint scanning or Face ID, you can set Boost to ask for your fingerprint or Face ID whenever you’re about to make a transaction instead of your 6-digit pin.

Update your app today & enjoy paying the new way!

WHAT'S NEW:

We’ve added an additional security option for you! If your phone supports fingerprint scanning or Face ID, you can set Boost to ask for your fingerprint or Face ID whenever you’re about to make a transaction instead of your 6-digit pin.

Update your app today & enjoy paying the new way!

We’re always finding new ways to boost your cashless experience! Say HELLO to our latest feature: Gated Parking.

You can now park & pay for your parking at Malls with Boost. Try it out at Gurney Mall, KL & Bus Terminal Bersepadu Selatan. More locations coming soon!

You know what they say? It’s so parking easy with Boost. No surcharge. No change. No hassle.

Go PREMIUM and stand a chance to win the all-new iPhone Pro & Shake Rewards of up to RM500!

How? It’s simple. All you have to do is:

1. Upgrade To Premium Wallet
2. Validate your details
3. Stay active by making a transaction.

What can we say? Go Premium, Get Pro.

Boosting closer towards a #PROgressiveMalaysia, one cashless transaction at a time.

We’re taking rewards to a whole new level, Boosties!

Introducing BoostUP! Our very own loyalty program where you can enjoy more rewards the more you Boost It. What's more, enjoy a sweet surprise with every Shake Rewards!

That’s not all, We now accept Union Pay International (UPI) QR Codes! Scan & Pay at over 17,000 UPI Merchants in Malaysia with Boost. Activate your Union Pay QR today!

It’s beginning to look a lot like Christmas!
Boost in every store
Take a look at the missions page, the seasonals are back again
With bigger prizes to be won and more~

That’s right - get ready cause we’re about to knock your Christmas socks off this holiday season. ALL-MONTH-LONG with new prizes each week!

We update the Boost App as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. In this latest update, we’ve squashed some bugs and added a new Christmas Shake Animation. #PaywithBoost and do the shake this festive season!

Update the Boost App now & have a wonderful Christmas Boosties.

It gives us great pleasure to announce Boost as an official e-Wallet for Program e-Tunai Rakyat!

Starting from 15 Jan 2020 till 14 March 2020, all eligible Malaysians will be able to claim a one-time sum of RM30 as part of the e-Tunai Rakyat Initiative through the Boost app.

We’re truly humbled by the faith the Government has shown in us and we look forward to empowering 15 million Malaysians with the means to participate in the digitisation of our economy.

Enjoy better overall app performance including faster loading time and bug fixes. Update the Boost App now and have a wonderful new year!

GONG XI FA CAI!
We hope you've had a great start to the new Chinese Zodiac, the year of the rat!
With that, it is time for an update!

Guess Huat's new?!

* Payment URL
Merchants can now share a payment link to customers
* New billing merchants
We’ve 6 new billers coming your way, keep a lookout!

Also with more prosperity, comes less bugs!

#PilihlahBoost
Enjoy:)

Thanks for using Boost!

In efforts to make your experiences with us even better, we've enhanced our app further by making the following changes!

i. New redemption feature! Submit our code so you can earn Boost coins!
ii. Bug fixes for our prepaid top ups
iii. UI enhancements, look out for this!

Be sure to update your app to enjoy these features!
#PilihlahBoost
Enjoy!

Hey Boosties!
Staying home and safe, we hope!

While we wait for the turmoil to get better, Boost still aspires to improve the quality of our app!

What’s new:

-New billers coming your way! Keep an eye out for this
-Cash out limit has been changed to a max of RM200, check out your wallet after updating for more info!

Take care and thanks for using Boost!
#PilihlahBoost

What’s new:

-New billers coming your way! Keep an eye out for this
-Cash out limit has been changed to a max of RM200, check out your wallet after updating for more info!

Take care and thanks for using Boost!
#PilihlahBoost

Hey Boosties!

We’ve two big updates for you! Let’s imagine a drumroll here

A BIGGER wallet size!
- Check your wallet to see how you can upgrade to our new premium wallet
- Premium users will only be able to have one premium account if you’ve multiple accounts currently

Raya is near!
- Check out what we have in store for you this Raya on our event page, these are offers you do not want to miss trust us!

Update now to enjoy these features!
#PilihlahBoost

Hey Boosties,
Ramadhan Mubarak!
With Raya almost a week away, we've some prettyyy big updates for you!

The Bigger Wallet is Finally Here!
What would you do with RM4,999?? Upgrade your wallet now for FREE to enjoy BIG benefits!

Partner Wallet
Introducing Boost Partner Wallet. Enjoy instant cashback at participating partners and use it for your next payment there!

e-Duit Raya
While this Ramadhan is a little different, let's continue the festivities by sending e-duit raya to your loved ones, launching this 22nd May!

Take care and stay safe Boosties!

We've updated Boost Missions to make it much easier to join. Keep a look out for mission banners for you to click and join. Furthermore, as we recover through the Covid-19 situation together, your BoostUP level will not be affected by quarterly assessments until further notice. This means, the only way to go, is UP!

To all Boosties in Subang Jaya! You can now pay for Street Parking directly from the Boost App, keeping you safe on your next grocery trip.

Quick riddle to start your week, Boosties!
What is able to travel around the globe, but stays in a corner the whole time?

While you think of the answer to that, update your Boost app now for:
- Cool new app enhancements & bug fixes
- iOS 14 support
- Pay your parking compounds, tax assessment, and retail rental under bill payments if you have any, be it one or more!

For iOS 9 users, please update your iPhone OS to an updated version to be able continue using Boost after the 5th of October 2020!

Till next time,
Stay safe!

Have a great week, Boosties. Stay safe!

"Good art is in the wallet of the beholder"
With that, there's just So Much you can do with Boost!

You can now buy BilllProtect insurance when you're paying for eligible bills in Boost.

BillProtect:
*Get reimbursed for eligible bills up to RM1,000 due to an accident.
*Get a lump sum pay-out of RM10,000 to settle your bills upon death or in the event of permanent disablement.

We care about you Boosties!

Also included in this update are bug fixes and enhancements.
Stay safe!

Did you know that orca's (they're dolphins by the way, not whales) often work together to accomplish everything from hunting to teaching their young by testing out different hunting techniques?

And like them, we too have our team continuously working together to fix bugs and enhancements to ensure a good app experience for you!

Update your app for the latest Boost features, enjoy!
